summary: All SkyRe hatchets can now be used in-place of an axe.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][b]New version made to support PerMa: [/b][/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74153/?][size=4][b]Link to mod[/b][/size]
[/url]


I play with SkyRe and Frostfall as a hunter, I don't like carrying a lot of useless stuff so carrying a bow, dagger, and axe sorta got on my nerves when hatchets were available (But they can't be used as an axe) So I made this. Simply adds the hatchets to the woodChoppingAxes Form-list. It is my fist mod (Yeah, another one of those guys)

Note: It still uses the default axe in the animation. No clue how to change it, nor would I have anywhere close to the skill level required.
DoublyNote: The hatchet will not satisfy the Frostfall axe requirement for fast-travel. (I may try to fix that later.)

A big thanks to IsharaMeradin on The Nexus Forums for helping me get the parenting correct and to the creators of SkyRe and Frostfall for their amazing mods.
author: Kimbroughhg
